Attacks.Name: Pound
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Clefairy gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Disarming Voice
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target suffers -1 defense die during its next defense roll.

Attacks.Name: Moonblast
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target gains the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Magic Guard
Superpowers.Effect: Clefairy cannot take damage from special conditions.

Superpowers.Name: Follow Me
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an allied character within Range 2. Until the start of Clefairy's next activation, attacks targeting that character must target Clefairy instead if possible.

Attacks.Name: Fairy Wind
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target is pushed S.

Superpowers.Name: Healing Wish
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 2 damage from Clefairy or an allied character within Range 2. If Clefairy uses this superpower, it gains the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Clefable character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
